00015 //============================
00016 ///worker info
00017 #define MASTER_RANK 0
00018 
00019 int _my_rank;
00020 int _num_workers;
00021 inline int get_worker_id()
00022 {
00023     return _my_rank;
00024 }
00025 inline int get_num_workers()
00026 {
00027     return _num_workers;
00028 }
00029 
00030 void init_workers()
00031 {
00032     MPI_Init(NULL, NULL);
00033     MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &_num_workers);
00034     MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &_my_rank);
00035 }
00036 
00037 void worker_finalize()
00038 {
00039     MPI_Finalize();
00040 }
00041 
00042 void worker_barrier()
00043 {
00044     MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00045 }

00050 struct WorkerParams {
00051     string input_path;
00052     string output_path;
00053     bool force_write;
00054     bool native_dispatcher; //true if input is the output of a previous blogel job
00055 
00056     WorkerParams()
00057     {
00058         force_write = true;
00059         native_dispatcher = false;
00060     }
00061 };
00062 
00063 struct MultiInputParams {
00064     vector<string> input_paths;
00065     string output_path;
00066     bool force_write;
00067     bool native_dispatcher; //true if input is the output of a previous blogel job
00068 
00069     MultiInputParams()
00070     {
00071         force_write = true;
00072         native_dispatcher = false;
00073     }
00074 
00075     void add_input_path(string path)
00076     {
00077         input_paths.push_back(path);
00078     }
00079 };

00146 enum BITS {
00147     HAS_MSG_ORBIT = 0,
00148     FORCE_TERMINATE_ORBIT = 1,
00149     WAKE_ALL_ORBIT = 2
00150 };
00151 //currently, only 3 bits are used, others can be defined by users
00152 char global_bor_bitmap;
00153 
00154 void clearBits()
00155 {
00156     global_bor_bitmap = 0;
00157 }
00158 
00159 void setBit(int bit)
00160 {
00161     global_bor_bitmap |= (2 << bit);
00162 }
00163 
00164 int getBit(int bit, char bitmap)
00165 {
00166     return ((bitmap & (2 << bit)) == 0) ? 0 : 1;
00167 }
00168 
00169 void hasMsg()
00170 {
00171     setBit(HAS_MSG_ORBIT);
00172 }
00173 
00174 void wakeAll()
00175 {
00176     setBit(WAKE_ALL_ORBIT);
00177 }
00178 
00179 void forceTerminate()
00180 {
00181     setBit(FORCE_TERMINATE_ORBIT);
00182 }
00183

00190     global_ghost_threshold = tau;
